comments:
Sometimes, when editing jsp files and after using Crtl+Space for completion of methods etc. the cursor positions itself wrong (like the following line).
Shortly after a NPE messsagebox appears, when deleting some chars. Strange things happen like writing right to left (because the cursor goes left of the just-typed char ...)
